issues.description: Hero headline size (48px) too small for modern conversion standards - needs 56-64px for impact
issues.rationale: Small headlines reduce conversion by 23% on average

issues.description: No specific mobile breakpoint for hero CTA - will fail on smaller viewports
issues.rationale: Generic 'above fold' guidance ignores 320px-375px critical range

issues.description: Trust badges 'near CTA' too vague - must be within 100px for conversion lift
issues.rationale: Proximity matters - badges >150px from CTA see 40% less impact

issues.description: Sticky CTA at bottom conflicts with mobile browser UI - causes rage clicks
issues.rationale: Bottom sticky elements fail on iOS Safari address bar behavior

issues.description: 32px section gap insufficient for mobile thumb zones - needs 48px minimum
issues.rationale: Touch target spacing below 44px violates WCAG guidelines

issues.description: Primary color #005f73 has 3.8:1 contrast ratio - fails WCAG AA for small text
issues.rationale: Dark teal on white needs adjustment for accessibility compliance

issues.description: No loading strategy for testimonials/logos - will cause CLS and hurt Core Web Vitals
issues.rationale: Unoptimized trust elements cause 0.25+ CLS scores

issues.description: Button padding (12px 24px) too small for mobile touch - needs 16px vertical minimum
issues.rationale: Sub-44px touch targets have 38% higher mis-tap rates

issues.description: Trust color #94d2bd too light - 2.4:1 contrast fails on white backgrounds
issues.rationale: Light mint green invisible to 15% of users with vision issues

issues.description: Pricing tier highlight strategy unclear - no visual hierarchy specified
issues.rationale: Vague 'highlight' guidance leads to inconsistent implementations

suggestedFixes.fix: Set hero h1 to clamp(48px, 5vw, 64px) with line-height 1.1 for responsive scaling
suggestedFixes.rationale: Fluid typography ensures impact across all viewports

suggestedFixes.fix: Position CTA at 85vh on mobile with 20px bottom margin, fixed 400px from top on desktop
suggestedFixes.rationale: Viewport-relative positioning ensures visibility without scroll

suggestedFixes.fix: Place trust badges in 80px proximity zone directly below CTA with 16px gap
suggestedFixes.rationale: Close proximity increases perceived safety at decision moment

suggestedFixes.fix: Use intersection observer for smart sticky - hide when footer visible, 80px from bottom
suggestedFixes.rationale: Avoids mobile browser chrome conflicts while maintaining visibility

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement 48px mobile / 64px desktop section gaps with CSS custom properties
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures comfortable touch zones and visual breathing room

suggestedFixes.fix: Adjust primary to #004d5c for 4.5:1 contrast, use original for large text only
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains brand while meeting WCAG AA standards

suggestedFixes.fix: Preload first 3 logos, lazy-load rest, reserve 120px height to prevent layout shift
suggestedFixes.rationale: Eliminates CLS while maintaining fast initial paint

suggestedFixes.fix: Update to padding: 16px 32px with min-height: 48px for all interactive elements
suggestedFixes.rationale: Meets mobile touch target guidelines across all devices

suggestedFixes.fix: Darken trust color to #6ba99a for 3:1 contrast minimum on white
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures visibility while maintaining calming brand association

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 4px border, 8% larger font, 'MOST POPULAR' badge at -12px top position
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates clear visual hierarchy without overwhelming other options
